text:
="preserve">"Jenny from the Block" is a song performed by American singer Jennifer Lopez. The song is a contemporary R&B and old school hip hop song. The single is about not changing despite having a fortune and being famous, and never forgetting where one came from.
The song was released on September 26, 2002. It hit #3 on the "Billboard" Hot 100. The song got mixed reviews from critics. It was a commercial success.
